Key Match Events: Mohammad Rizwan scored 131* off 121 balls and took 3 catches.
Hasan Ali took 4 wickets for 71 runs.
Pakistan won by 6 wickets with 10 balls remaining.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan chased the target of 345 in 48.2 overs.
Player of the Match was Mohammad Rizwan.
Match was held at Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, Uppal, Hyderabad.
Sri Lanka won the toss and elected to bat first.
